article_title: Mark Caserta: Consider impact of Obamacare when voting
article_text:
Huntington, WV (25701)

Today

Chance of late night showers.

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Thunder possible. Low 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

og.description: As many of us are busy "revving our mental motors" to pick the most qualified 2016 presidential candidate, it's time to revisit the impact of the largest form of socialist
